facts.name: Study
facts.desc: A 19-year old 2B Software Engineer studying at the University of Waterloo.

facts.name: Code
facts.desc: Aspiring JavaScript and Node.js web developer. I also use Java. Then there's Python, C++, C, Lua, Ruby/Rails...

facts.name: Game
facts.desc: Ultra-passionate indie game developer. I've used libGDX, Love2D, Unity, and am learning everyday.

facts.name: Art
facts.desc: I love to draw digitally in my spare time! I've made artwork of all kinds and sold some at conventions.

projects.name: Keytar
projects.desc: A Chrome extension where users type on a modified keyboard using a microphone and guitar. 2nd place winner at EngHack Spring 2015.

projects.name: Sushi Ninja
projects.desc: Multiplayer sushi-grabbing, ninja-dashing game made for GI Jam of Spring 2015. Won prize for most polished and completed!

projects.name: Crystal Temple
projects.desc: A detailed illustration of Steven Universe and the Crystal Gems, the main characters of Steven Universe.

projects.name: Sun Slayer
projects.desc: A short game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 32, themed around un-conventional weapons. Play as a fire hydrant and extinguish the sun.

projects.name: Hop Potato
projects.desc: Multiplayer party game that brings 8 players together in an intense, frantic game of hot potato. Winner of Kik Hack Week 15.04.

projects.name: Filespace
projects.desc: Webapp that aggregates online file storages like Dropbox and Drive. Built at Hack Western 2015.
tools: Node.js, jQuery, Dropbox API, Google Drive API

projects.name: My Website
projects.desc: Designed vertically and mobile-friendly, this website shows off my abilities and interests.

projects.name: Frog Smileys
projects.desc: Mockups of potential smileys for the Kik messenger, designed to match their existing style.

projects.name: The Resistance
projects.desc: Top-10 EngHack Winter 2015 project. Helper webapp for 'The Resistance', eliminating physical boards, cards, and counters.

projects.name: Match 3
projects.desc: Top-3 project at the Kik hackathon. Enter a game room using Kik and compete in real-time to find matching patterns!

projects.name: Garden Guard
projects.desc: 2-player turn-based strategy game at the Winter 2015 GI Jam. Compete to grow, water, and cut trees on a shared land.

projects.name: Little UFO
projects.desc: Control a UFO in a randomly generated terrain and abduct various objects that respond to physics.

projects.name: The Avatar
projects.desc: Figure drawing sketch practice of Avatar Korra. Drawn in celebration of the series finale of The Legend of Korra.

projects.name: Smash Tracker
projects.desc: Simple Rails webapp to store, search, and compare Super Smash Bros. 1-on-1 match and player records.

projects.name: Highrise
projects.desc: A modernized rendering of an imaginary living room. Drawn as practice for one-point perspective and interior design.

projects.name: Fiery Flight
projects.desc: 2-player co-op game, winner of the Fall 2014 GI Jam Player's Choice Award. Work together with mouse and keyboard to chase your fiery nemesis!

projects.name: Wordasm
projects.desc: A chatroom/word game hybrid at Hack the North 2014 where players compete in real-time to find words quickly.

projects.name: Scorched
projects.desc: A fast-paced arcade game where the player tries to survive waves of molten monsters!

projects.name: Mineral Miner
projects.desc: A puzzle game that challenges players to navigate, match, and collect gems on a grid.

projects.name: Chill Jam
projects.desc: A detailed rendering of main Adventure Time cast members playing music together.
